config.emmylua.codeAction.insertSpace.de: Add space after `---` comments when inserting `@diagnostic disable-next-line`.
config.emmylua.colors.global.description: If not empty, highlights global variables with the given color
config.emmylua.colors.local.description: If not empty, highlights local variables with the given color
config.emmylua.colors.mutableUnderline.d: Add underline to variables if they're reassigned within their scope
config.emmylua.colors.parameter.descript: If not empty, highlights function parameters with the given color
config.emmylua.completion.autoRequire.de:
Automatically insert call to `require` when autocompletion
inserts objects from other modules.
config.emmylua.completion.baseFunctionIn: Whether to include the name in the base function completion. Effect: `function () end` -> `function name() end`.
config.emmylua.completion.postfix.descri: Symbol that's used to trigger postfix autocompletion.
config.emmylua.diagnostics.diagnosticInt: Delay between opening/changing a file and scanning it for errors, in milliseconds.
config.emmylua.documentColor.enable.desc: Enable parsing strings for color tags and showing a color picker next to them.
config.emmylua.hint.enumParamHint.descri:
Show name of enumerator when passing a literal value to a function
that expects an enum.

Example:

```lua
--- @enum Level
local Foo = {
   Info = 1,
   Error = 2,
}

--- @param l Level
function print_level(l) end

print_level(1 --[[ Hint: Level.Info ]])
```
config.emmylua.hint.indexHint.descriptio:
Show named array indexes.

Example:

```lua
local array = {
   [1] = 1, -- [name]
}

print(array[1] --[[ Hint: name ]])
```
config.emmylua.hint.metaCallHint.descrip:
Show hint when calling an object results in a call to
its meta table's `__call` function.
config.emmylua.hint.overrideHint.descrip: Show methods that override functions from base class.
config.emmylua.hint.paramHint.descriptio: Show parameter names in function calls and parameter types in function definitions.
config.emmylua.ls.executablePath.descrip:
Override path to the EmmyLua language server executable.

Uses bundled language server if not specified
config.emmylua.ls.globalConfigPath.descr:
Path to the global `.emmyrc.json`.

Settings from this file will be used if they're not overridden by the project's `.emmyrc.json`
config.emmylua.ls.startParameters.descri: Additional arguments to be passed to the EmmyLua language server
config.emmylua.misc.autoInsertTripleDash: Automatically insert `"---"` when line breaking after a comment
config.emmylua.references.fuzzySearch.de:
Use fuzzy search when searching for symbol usages
and normal search didn't find anything.
config.emmylua.references.shortStringSea: Also search for usages in strings.
config.emmylua.workspace.enableReindex.d: Enable full project reindex after changing a file.
config.emmylua.workspace.reindexDuration: Delay between changing a file and full project reindex, in milliseconds.
config.lua.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VSCode and the EmmyLua language server in the Output view. Default is `off`
debug.attach.captureLog: Capture process log with Windows Terminal
debug.attach.label: EmmyLua: Attach by process id
debug.attach.name: Attach by process id
debug.launch.desc: Launch program and debug with attach debugger
debug.launch.label: EmmyLua: Attach by launch program
debug.launch.name: Attach by launch program
debug.launch.program: Launch program and debug executable file
